website_summaries.verdict: Though it's stylish, affordable, and easy to use, the Nikon Coolpix S210 performance and photo quality aren't nearly as pretty.
pros: some nice features for the money
cons: poor-to-average photo quality for its class

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it...works great! I have already have a pink one and this one was for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Fefe

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps the perfect camera
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the second Coolpix S210 I have owned, the first one went with me everywhere but finally was done in by the super fine sand on Padre Island. These cameras simply take great pictures without even trying. Highly recommended. When my first one gave out I bought the 3100 and while it worked fine the pictures just wenen't as good. More pixels isnt always better.
customer_reviews.author: svetlana

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage and a complete waste of my money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my daughter who, while taking her 35mm photography class, could still enjoy taking digital photos with her friends and use when we go places. She had it for only a few weeks before the infamous lens error issue crept up and rendered her camera useless. It was a total waste of money and I wish I could have a do-over and NOT spend the money in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: CMcV23

customer_reviews.title: Nice little slim-style zoom camera
customer_reviews.text: (Wife): Our daughter uses this camera sometimes. It's worked just great for her needs.
customer_reviews.author: David Gruen

customer_reviews.title: product is great. like this camera
customer_reviews.text: great camera. takes good pics in light and dark. fast flash recharge. fast response (can take one pic after another on single pic mode with only about a 2 sec delay. also has multi-shot mode). too bad seller lied about its condition. buying used stuff from amazon has it's drawbacks but their guarantee makes it a little easier to deal with when someone tries to deceive you.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Marz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera have used for many occasions, Nikon is top quality for pros.
customer_reviews.author: SolidSShady

customer_reviews.title: Great Slim Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera. I am generally a fan of the larger cameras with a more professional look. I bought this camera because I recently had a baby and I needed something that wasn't so big to carry around. This is a great little camera to slip in the pocket of a diaper bag or in a pants pocket. The pictures it takes are also very good. If you are in a dimly lit room however, the flash does creat a shadow on the bottom of your pictures, so be careful with that. Otherwise this is a great camera that can travel anywhere without being a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nikon nice upgrade from my older model
customer_reviews.text: This model is the best digital camera I have seen under $ 125 looks similar to the Casio a family member has only my Nikon has smaller lcd screen, otherwise, they are almost identical. wonder if Casio makes these for Nikon ? Get one today. I got Black so it has no reflections from the sun when I take photos of people.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle James

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to provide quick snap-shots for art projects and miscellaneous items. I wanted something small, yet with a larger mega-pixel capability. It fits in your pocket easily, starts up quickly, takes great pictures, and has been very dependable. Much better than a previous Olympus that got dropped in the water... Very affordable too!
customer_reviews.author: Barry Hoerz

customer_reviews.title: Fun camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is ideal for someone like me... NOT tech-savvy! Point & shoot, & get great pictures that are easy to download on to a computer. However, once I read all the directions, I will be able to do much more than just point and click; this really is a versatile camera! I'm looking forward to enjoying it for a really long time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy, nothing more, nothing less
customer_reviews.text: The camera is easy to use, love the color....but you get what you pay for. I wish I would have spent the extra $50 something for the added pixels and optical zoom on the S520. I get blurry pics and I don't see any image stabilization, it doesn't zoom very far, and the camera is really light-weight, so make sure you wear the wrist strap or the thing may go flying. Overall its a good deal, but if you don't plan on buying another camera anytime soon, fork out the extra cash for a better model.
customer_reviews.author: A. Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Well, it's portable.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I purchased this as a complement to our Nikon D80 with the intent that she'd carry this small camera in her purse for candids. All told, we're pleased with the size and speed of the camera but it really struggles to focus, has a difficult time handling either bright or low light, and takes pictures that I'd describe as "better than nothing". We love our D80 and hoped just a bit of that Nikon know-how could be found here and are having a tough time to find it.
customer_reviews.author: FiveAgainst1

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera that's why I bought another one
customer_reviews.text: Had this same camera before it fell in the water, let it sit for 4 months to dry out and worked again for another year or so ...Great Camera that's why I bought another one :) Love it very easy to use...
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth E. Distefano

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I chose this camera over the other options I had. The picture quality is amazing, the video quality is amazing and the battery life is amazing. It's so simple and easy to use and you get wonderful results. I definitely recommend this camera. There's not a thing that I don't like about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna75

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Great picture. Easy to to download pictures into the P C. Great value. Makes a great Gift.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Matheny

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: it was was broken and corroded. Total piece of junk
customer_reviews.author: kusaichan

customer_reviews.title: Love iy
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Simple to use. I broke my other one so had to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Gadzooks

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera we bought for my daughter's 11th birthday and for my 58 year old mother's Christmas present. It is simple to use, has lots of fun features (like audio recording and video recording), and takes really nice pictures. It is a great value, one of the few cameras you can get in this price range with a charger and lithium battery. In my opinion, it takes just as good of pictures as other cameras that cost double.
customer_reviews.author: N. Gravenhorst

customer_reviews.title: more than a simple image
customer_reviews.text: simply perfect Purchased this camera looking a little more than a simple image, without thinking I got a camera with a balance of basic and simple, with professional features. undoubtedly the best in its category.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works nice
customer_reviews.text: gave this as a present and it did was it was suppose to do. Take quick pics when needed out of the purse.

customer_reviews.title: simple to use and versatile
customer_reviews.text: easy to use with a variety of setting to best capture a sunset or other scenes. cute unit. would have preferred more optical zoom but could not find in a camera at this price range. thanks nikon
customer_reviews.author: d.l.

customer_reviews.title: Nikon S-210
customer_reviews.text: This camera does a great job if you let it. Meaning just put it in automatic and select the stabalization to auto and let it go. The first pictures we took were using different settings and they did not turn out too good. Once we put everything in auto it worked out great! We even blew up a shot on the beach to an 8 by 10 and the detail was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lgantcha

customer_reviews.title: digital camera
customer_reviews.text: I always carry two camera with me so when one of my cameras gave up the ghost, I decided on this one. It is small but has really good qualities. The picture is quite clear and it is easy to use. Plus, once it is charged, it stays charged for a long time. I would buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Donnese Barrington

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix camera great !!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this type of camera before, and was not hesitant to order it again. My daughter recommended it to me, and it's been great.
customer_reviews.author: Millie

customer_reviews.title: good solid rugged little camera
customer_reviews.text: this is a good solid rugged little camera, with excellent sound pick-up, as one reviewer already noted.
customer_reviews.author: kelpy reader writer artist chef

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift. Hasn't lasted as long as my Cannon digital camera. Picture quality is okay. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: K. F. Younglove

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: The color is cool. The picture quality could be better; even for a point and shoot. My other daughter's point and shoot operates better and has better picture quality. This camera is better suited for younger kids where picture quality is not as important.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hymanson

customer_reviews.title: Beware: Lens is JUNK.
customer_reviews.text: After owning the camera for less than 8 weeks, I got a lens error just by turning it on. The camera was never dropped or bumped and was kept in a case whenever not in use. A bit of research showed that lens errors are not at all uncommon for this camera, so I must conclude that the lens has some sort of design flaw. Nikon may make outstanding DSLRs, but this point and shoot appears to be junk.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Realmuto

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It came early then inspected love it an I use it all time
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: 2 cameras, 2 "lens errors" = AVOID
customer_reviews.text: Title says it all,2 brand new S210's and both have been rendered useless due to "lens errors". Would avoid this model at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: It's ok since it's used.
customer_reviews.text: Best result is to use it as an outdoors and to shoot landscapes. Tap the zoom in twice, that's the best shot you'll get. It's up to you to measure the distance.
customer_reviews.author: Club man

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: Takes great pictures and is simple to use. Small enough to fit in a purse or pocket easily but big enough to see whats in the view finder without glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Txgparents

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly the item I was searching for at a great price. I gave it as a gift for a young teenager. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl E. Weagraff

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera not only looks cool, it's also cool to use. All the icons help me to get what I want and where I need to be to get my perfect shots. The quality of my photos were fantastic! Thank you Coolpix!
customer_reviews.author: Jolierey

customer_reviews.title: Cool camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for an upcoming vacation. Its so small (almost the same size as my cell phone) and fits great in my pocket. My old camera was bulky and not pocket-friendly. It starts super fast too, so you won't miss any "kodak moments." Picture quality seems up to par although I haven't used it that much yet. Fairly simple to use; I spent an hour or so going over the manual. Altogether a pretty good buy!
customer_reviews.author: S. Haver

customer_reviews.title: Nice little digital camera
customer_reviews.text: It's a handy small digital camera. Impressed with it capacity in dark places. Some times, not easy to handle because it small size. The battery don't last so much so another, or a third battery, are needed. Nice colors and fine focus. I have a SLR Nikon D80 and this small one is perfect to complement the "big brother"
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Robledo

customer_reviews.title: it is ok
customer_reviews.text: The first time I got it it didnit work for too long but then they sent me another one, it was very nice of them. It has been working good since then.
customer_reviews.author: helen

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Little
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the casual user who likes to e-mail photos, but features allow excellent grabs for printing enlargements.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Terrific & fun little camera!
customer_reviews.text: I hate taking pictures and I always have to learn any new electronic device that we buy. This camera was for my wife and she easily understood everything she needed to take some great pictures. It really is a great little camera.
customer_reviews.author: PyrateDan

customer_reviews.title: Nice little camera
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but a memory card is a must. Only 30 ish shots stored internally.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Ok camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic point and shoot camera. I had a canon that seemed more durable. Also, Ashton Kutcher is not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I love Nikon cameras! So I had to stay in the family when I upgraded. This small, sleek camera is easy to carry as well as to use. The new features and added megapixels are even more of a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Sade

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera / Wrong SD Card
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for general everyday use. The only problem I had was that I purchased this camera bundled with the recommended Kingston SD Card on Amazon's website. I was having trouble with the camera not saving the photos to the SD Card. I contacted Nikon's tech support and they informed me that only SanDisk, Lexar, Toshiba and Panasonic SD Cards are approved for use in this camera. I honestly don't see how that makes a difference but I will be trying a different card to see if that works.
customer_reviews.author: A. S.

customer_reviews.title: nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: for the price i bought this camera i think i would be able to buy a canon or something... it is really cute and but night pictures not really good...
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, great price and the quality is awesome! The user face is super easy and not complex, figured it out in just a few minutes. I purchased one for my parents for Christmas, makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good product ... good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter ... so far we've both been pleased with the product and it's value. Of course it's Nikon ... I'd not expect less.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk-eye

customer_reviews.title: nikon
customer_reviews.text: I loved how easy it was to carry, in my pocket or purse, to take pictures of a road trip with my children. Took mini video clips of them in action and stills of them posing as tourists.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ciszek

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Horrible didn't even turn on looks beat up very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: robert blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Poor photo quality
customer_reviews.text: This camera was sent back because the photos were very grainy at all settings. Hoping the new one works better.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Holmgreen

customer_reviews.title: nikon s210
customer_reviews.text: camera works very easily and was shipped in time for the holidays.the camera is easy to operate and understand. the delete feature is quick without having to go thru menu screens like my olympus camera
customer_reviews.author: George J. Rivers

customer_reviews.title: AAHHHH-MAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I AM EXTREMELY HAPPY WITH THIS CAMERA. I FEEL I DEFINITIVELY GOT MY MONEYS WORTH AND COULDNT ASK FOR MORE.I TAKE IT WITH ME EVERYWHERE AND CANT STOP CLICKING LOL. OVERALL I GIVE IT A 5 UT OF 5.
customer_reviews.author: VAVA312

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix P2 is much better
customer_reviews.text: The photos don't come out as clearly as when I take them on my NIkon Coolpix P2 & I'm not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: barbaija

customer_reviews.title: Pink pictures
customer_reviews.text: Camera worked fine for about a year. Then the pictures started having a pinkish tint. I went to a camera shop and was told that the sensor was defective.
customer_reviews.author: DScott

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: The item came with a problem but it was successfully replaced and it didn't take too long, so I'm satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Stela

customer_reviews.title: NOT happy
customer_reviews.text: I paid for 3-5 day shipping and it still took 10 days to get to my door. I used the camera for one weekend and it already says lens error. I got hussled on the shipping and now the camera doesn't even work. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Thomsen

customer_reviews.title: nice camera
customer_reviews.text: very nice camera but i haven't used that one still i bought it for giving a gift to my family
customer_reviews.author: Savita Kishore

customer_reviews.title: Slick little digital camera!
customer_reviews.text: This compact, stylish digital camera packs a punch in technology and features not expected in such an affordable option, particularly from a name brand like Nikon. Bravo... terrific value.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lee

product_meta.title: Nikon Coolpix S210 8.0MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Graphite Black) (OLD MODEL)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackFROM THE MANUFACTURER


 Functional beauty in an alluringly slim body. Packing sophisticated style, advanced functions and high performance into its ultra-slim design, the Coolpix S210 fits comfortably in the hand and simplifies operation. 

Coolpix S210 Highlights 

VR image stabilization Compensating for the effects of camera shake to realize sharper results, electronic VR image stabilization frees you to enjoy capturing special moments without worrying about slight hand movements, particularly in lower light conditions. 

ISO 2000 capability Light sensitivity range up to ISO 2000 allows the use of faster shutter speeds to avoid blurred results when shooting moving subjects or in locations with insuffi cient lighting. ISO sensitivity is automatically optimized in High-Sensitivity mode. 

Coolpix Premium Features 

Coolpix in-camera technologies give you the edge when it comes to taking beautiful pictures more easily and with greater enjoyment. Included are innovative functions that increase shooting opportunities in a broader range of situations, help to optimize images, and add a new dimension of fun to sharing those results. 

VR image stabilization Nikon Coolpix cameras offer an array of VR technologies that produce blur-free images when shooting in unsteady conditions or at slower shutter speeds. Selected models are equipped with one of two types of Optical VR, Lens Shift VR, which delivers sharp and steady images effective for shooting and faster framing with the LCD, or Image Sensor Shift VR, which moves the image sensor to accurately compensate for camera shake. Other models offer Electronic VR which applies movement data to image processing to turn blurred images into beautifully clear results. 

Better pictures in lower light Selected Coolpix models offer ISO capability beyond the range of conventional digital compacts. An exciting advantage that greatly increases photographic possibilities, high ISO capability delivers excellent exposure in challenging conditions, broadens the scope of possible subjects and allows scenes to be captured beautifully without compromising natural light. 

Face-priority AF Available only with Nikon Coolpix cameras, the clever Face-priority AF function helps ensure satisfyingly crisp portraits no matter where the subject is in the shot. By automatically detecting people's faces in the frame, the photographer is free to press the shutter for sharp portraits with focus exactly where it's wanted. 

D-Lighting Only Nikon delivers the advantage of D-Lighting, a unique technology with the ability to rescue underexposed images or shots taken with excessive backlight. Accessible in Playback mode, this innovative feature automatically creates a copy of the image, adding light and detail added where necessary, while leaving correctly-exposed areas untouched. As a result, images are significantly improved in a manner that is much more natural looking. 

In-camera red-eye fix Coolpix cameras offer refined red-eye reduction capability that surpasses other digital compacts. First, a series of pre-flashes stimulate the subject’s pupils, causing them to constrict. The camera then analyzes the captured image for the remaining presence of red eyes, automatically correcting them in-camera before saving the image to memory.
feature_bullets: 8.0-megapixel resolution for stunning prints as large as 16 x 20 inches
3x optical zoom; Electronic VR image stabilization
In-Camera Red-Eye Fix; enhanced Face-Priority AF automatically focuses on up to 12 faces
Capture images to SD memory card (not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars158 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
